attributes.review: I’m not on board with the whole “gen z tries to remove the app” thing, but this app is awful. It keeps crashing and it’s bad quality. I love Mr. Trump and all, but this app is 💩💩. This app definitely deserves to be removed at once. I can’t believe that I agree with gen z for once, but I do.
attributes.title: Terrible!! Absolutely awful!!

attributes.review: There was no child porn on here but I know Donny has so much, so why isn’t he sharing?! Also when I opened the app, a man dressed a fish rang my doorbell, punched me in the spleen and ran off with my wife, my sriracha sauce and my antique Swedish penis enlarger. 3.4/10, missing my spicy sauce but still waiting for that child pornography..
attributes.title: Child pornography 🤭🤭😭

attributes.review: This app is as dysfunctional as Donald Trump ans his administration. Doesn’t work like Donal Trump. I dont think Im supposed to inject lysol into my body because it can kill you, but Donald Trump said it may work. Im going to listen to the CDC.
